name: Agathion Magic
summary: The harmonious magic of Nirvana flows through you.
description:
The harmonious magic of Nirvana flows through you. You can cast animal form and calm emotions each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
